title: Piss Rebel

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Piss on someone’s house. Urinetown members who have their house pissed on are roleblocked to call the police for the night through immunity

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Cannot spawn unless Urinetown exists
- If you manage to piss on 4 Urinetown member’s homes without being hung, then all Urinetown members will be roleblocked the following night to hold a council meeting, which you will use the time to flee in victory
- If you’re killed by a Urinetown member or are sent to Urinetown, then the CEO (4497) gains a one time use basic attack

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: _Piss off_ the Urinetown by pissing on 4 Urinetown member’s homes

desc:
Post 4508
_Fuck you corporate, I’ll piss where I want_
